DOC.brief_title: Cone Beam Computed Tomography Evaluating Corticotomy-assisted Maxillary Expansion
DOC.detailed_description: Maxillary expansion perform adult female patient suffer maxillary constriction bilateral posterior cross-bite & dental arch discrepancy average 12 mm use fix Quad-helix appliance , 8 month . The appliance deliver activated day corticotomy bone graft ( demineralize freeze-dried bone allograft ) . The activation make half-molar unit side . The patient schedule month activate appliance reactivate need . Corticotomy perform area maxillary 1st premolar , 2nd premolar first molar . Cone beam compute tomography perform three stage . T1 ( baseline ) Before appliance activation corticotomy . T2 At end expansion . ( 8 month expansion ) . T3 At finish stage orthodontic treatment ( average 2.5 year start treatment ) .
DOC.criteria: Adult female patient ( 1822 year ) suffer maxillary constriction bilateral posterior crossbite . Dental arch discrepancy average 12 mm . Having give systemic disease . Taking type medication and/or antibiotic therapy 3 month study . Did n't perform previous orthodontic treatment . Current former smoker .
